children.name: JavaScript (ES6+)
children.blurb: Expert in modern JavaScript for building complex, interactive single-page applications.

children.name: React
children.blurb: Proficient in building complex, stateful applications using modern React features like Hooks and the Context API.

children.name: State Management
children.blurb: Skilled in managing application state using the Context API for localized state and TanStack Query for complex server-state.

children.name: UI Libraries
children.blurb: Experienced with various component libraries to accelerate UI development and ensure consistency.

children.name: Material UI (MUI)
children.blurb: Built applications following Material Design principles using MUI.

children.name: Mantine UI
children.blurb: Used Mantine for its rich set of hooks and components.

children.name: TypeScript
children.blurb: Proficient in building type-safe applications and migrating JavaScript codebases.

children.name: HTML5 & CSS3
children.blurb: Deep understanding of semantic HTML, accessibility (ARIA), and modern CSS layouts like Flexbox and Grid.

children.name: Java Test Automation
children.blurb: Deep experience in building robust automation frameworks in a Java ecosystem.

children.blurb: Expert in browser automation and managing complex test suites.

children.name: Cucumber (BDD)
children.blurb: Experienced in writing feature files and step definitions for Behavior-Driven Development.

children.name: Katalon Studio
children.blurb: Certified and skilled in using Katalon for end-to-end test automation.

children.name: JavaScript Testing
children.blurb: Experienced in testing frontend applications with modern JS tools.

children.name: Cypress
children.blurb: Used Cypress for end-to-end testing of user flows.

children.name: Backend as a Service (BaaS)
children.blurb: Proficient in leveraging BaaS for rapid application development.

children.name: Firebase & Firestore
children.blurb: Used Firebase Auth and Firestore for real-time data and user management.

children.name: Supabase
children.blurb: Leveraged Supabase for its PostgreSQL database and auth features.

children.name: CI/CD & Hosting
children.blurb: Experienced in setting up automated build and deployment pipelines.
